topicTitle: The Guess The Random Reference Game

posts.postText:
Simple. Guess what the last post was a reference to.
Only rule is if someone guesses incorrect you still have to keep doing the one that no one has guessed before making a new reference.

For Example:

*Reference*
*Guessed Reference*
Alright you got it right
Okay *New Reference*

Not

*Reference*
*Guessed Reference Wrong or Ignored Reference*
*Guess Reference Above as Opposed to First Reference*


I'll start:

You're not a freak, Chickenfoot. You're just stupid.
I go to church, I'm a christian.
a wee bit unspecific, but methinks its gingers have souls?

not sure many can get this one...

" I'm uber uber leet.. so uber uber leet. What a wonderful feeling I'm pwning again!" 

 http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/1421/305108183.jpg

" I'm uber uber leet.. so uber uber leet. What a wonderful feeling I'm pwning again!"

Judging by the picture, something by Nhym or Level 70 Elite tauren chieftain?
